description: What a good notebook! Simple to use, clean interface. If you don't need formatted text, you don't have to have it. I could wish for just one thing more: a system tray widget that, if clicked on, would open the app's main window, paste in whatever is on the clipboard, and position the cursor in the title field ready for a title.
I like the "Words" auto search in the bottom left. It also has a spell checker.
summary: I like it. It does what I want

description: i have my diary in this app, is easy to use and it has a beautiful Gui
